name: Pago Mobile
tag_list: lifestyle-commerce, ecommerce, app, mobile-app, mobile-payments, mobile-payment-app, hard-rock, mountain-view
overview:
Pago is the first of its kind, offering a true “lifestyle commerce” experience that simplifies everyday transactions for all users.

Providing a new way for consumers and businesses to interact with one another, users download the free app enabling them to browse, order and pay on the go. Pago users enjoy the flexibility and freedom they are afforded in being able to accomplish habitual tasks without the wait and worry associated with traditional payment methods.

Pago enables businesses to get to know their customers, and use that knowledge to reward loyalty, offer targeted deals, and communicate easily. Merchants benefit from the real-time customer data that is easily accessible through their secure interface â€“ a community is created highlighting consumers and reviews. Pago is used across a wide variety of businesses, including restaurants, coffee shops, bars, salons, Laundromats, and fitness centers. It works with along side the merchantâ€™s existing point of sale system (or standalone).

Pago was founded by Leo Rocco and is available at the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas and at over 50 businesses in Mountain View, Calif.

milestones.description: Pago launches in Mountain View, CA
